last_episode_to_air.name: Chapter X
last_episode_to_air.overview: Opening night of the Varsity Show yields big surprises and a sobering encounter. In the future, the friends’ reunion takes an emotional turn.

name: Dear White People
overview: At a predominantly white Ivy League college, a diverse group of students navigate various forms of racial and other types of discrimination.

seasons.name: Volume 1
seasons.overview: Students of color navigate the daily slights and slippery politics of life at an Ivy League college that's not nearly as "post-racial" as it thinks.

seasons.name: Volume 2
seasons.overview: Romantic dilemmas, a social media troll and big changes at Armstrong-Parker House push Sam, Lionel and friends to the breaking point.

seasons.name: Volume 4
seasons.overview: Reunited amid a pandemic, future Sam and Lionel look back on their epic final year together at Winchester — which plays out as a '90s musical.

tagline: The only way forward is to throw it back.

episodes.name: Chapter I
episodes.overview: As college radio host Samantha White leads the outcry over a blackface party on campus, a revelation about her love life puts her in an awkward spot.

episodes.name: Chapter II
episodes.overview: Buoyed by his front-page story on the party, shy reporter Lionel begins to come out of his shell and embrace his true identity.

episodes.name: Chapter III
episodes.overview: Golden boy Troy schmoozes his way around campus at his dad's behest, campaigning for student body president. But his smile hides nagging doubts.

episodes.name: Chapter IV
episodes.overview: As Coco gears up for an exclusive soiree, a fight with Sam stirs up memories of their friendship -- and the differences that drove them apart.

episodes.name: Chapter V
episodes.overview: Friends drag Reggie out on the town to stop him from brooding over the revolution and Sam's new beau. But the night takes a harrowing turn.

episodes.name: Chapter VI
episodes.overview: Shell-shocked, Sam and company plan a protest against the campus police, while Reggie finds his own way to process the ordeal.

episodes.name: Chapter VII
episodes.overview: Picking up on the chemistry between Sam and Reggie, Gabe obsesses over the state of his relationship -- and makes a startling confession to Joelle.

episodes.name: Chapter VIII
episodes.overview: To show just how pervasive Winchester's race problems are, Lionel sets out to write a feature on Troy and makes some unexpected discoveries.

episodes.name: Chapter IX
episodes.overview: Coco jumps at the chance to join Troy at a party for wealthy donors, but the evening leaves her questioning his priorities.

episodes.name: Chapter X
episodes.overview: With tensions running high before the town hall, Sam tries to patch up her relationship, Coco steals Troy's thunder, and Lionel makes a bold move.

1.name: Volume 1
1.overview: Students of color navigate the daily slights and slippery politics of life at an Ivy League college that's not nearly as "post-racial" as it thinks.

episodes.name: Chapter I
episodes.overview: In the wake of the town hall protest, Sam finds herself at the center of an alt-right backlash and goes to war with a social media troll.

episodes.name: Chapter II
episodes.overview: Still haunted by flashbacks to the house party, Reggie bounces from therapy to Bible study to drinking as he seeks an outlet for his pent-up emotions.

episodes.name: Chapter III
episodes.overview: While party-hopping on Pride Night, Lionel struggles to make small talk with strangers and decipher mixed signals from Silvio.

episodes.name: Chapter IV
episodes.overview: With her political capital on the rise, Coco sets her sights on a new role. But a startling discovery forces her to rethink her future at Winchester.

episodes.name: Chapter V
episodes.overview: Tired of living in Sam's shadow, Joelle strikes up a flirtation with a student outside the A-P circle who treats her like a queen.

episodes.name: Chapter VI
episodes.overview: Lionel puts his fledgling romance in jeopardy as he teams up with Brooke to hunt down @AltIvyW's identity for an exposé.

episodes.name: Chapter VII
episodes.overview: After bombing at a stand-up comedy set, Troy sets out on a shroom-fueled quest to find his true voice, connecting with friends and exes along the way.

episodes.name: Chapter VIII
episodes.overview: Gabe finally gets a chance to interview Sam for his documentary, but they both have trouble sticking to their promise not to make things personal.

episodes.name: Chapter IX
episodes.overview: A family emergency draws Sam home, where she wrestles with feelings of guilt and stumbles across a piece of Winchester history.

episodes.name: Chapter X
episodes.overview: As the campus braces for Rikki Carter's speech, Sam and Lionel piece together the clues they've gathered on the secret society known as Order of X.

2.name: Volume 2
2.overview: Romantic dilemmas, a social media troll and big changes at Armstrong-Parker House push Sam, Lionel and friends to the breaking point.

episodes.name: Chapter I
episodes.overview: With Sam, Lionel and the rest of the crew caught up in their own priorities, Al suddenly feels like the only one fighting for change at Winchester.

episodes.name: Chapter II
episodes.overview: While Brooke chases a story on a controversial filmmaker-in-residence, am tries to bluff her way through a big pitch, and Lionel goes on the prowl.

episodes.name: Chapter III
episodes.overview: After landing his first cover story in Pastiche, Troy makes an unsettling discovery. Money troubles prompt Gabe to join a campus labor movement.

episodes.name: Chapter IV
episodes.overview: After landing his first cover story in Pastiche, Troy makes an unsettling discovery. Money troubles prompt Gabe to join a campus labor movement.

episodes.name: Chapter V
episodes.overview: On Parents Weekend, Coco sets out to win a recommendation from the toughest professor on campus -- while contending with an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: Chapter VI
episodes.overview: Troy leads an insurrection at Pastiche, Gade takes a dubious step to raise money for his film, and Reggie makes some improvements to Moses's app.

episodes.name: Chapter VII
episodes.overview: As Chester's popularity soars, Lionel tries to convince D'unte and friends that he's ready for the gay "deep end". Sam gets a chance to meet her idol.

episodes.name: Chapter VIII
episodes.overview: A sexual assault allegation stirs up fierce debate at Armstrong-Parker House and drives Joelle and Reggie even farther apart.

episodes.name: Chapter IX
episodes.overview: Brooke takes a new approach with Muffy, a guilt-stricken Gabe tries to make up for his mistake, and Troy woos an investor for his new magazine.

episodes.name: Chapter X
episodes.overview: A bombshell story in the debut issue of Fried Chichanery leads to a moment of reckoning. Sam and Lionel learn there's more to the Order than they knew.

episodes.name: Chapter I
episodes.overview: On the first day of senior year, the campus is abuzz with Career Day plans and news that AP House will be producing Winchester's historic Varsity Show.

episodes.name: Chapter II
episodes.overview: As Reggie considers a sweet job offer, Joelle seizes a chance to blend faith and science, and Troy makes his pitch to the Black Caucus.

episodes.name: Chapter III
episodes.overview: Facing pressure from the Order to make the Varsity Show a hit, Troy finds unexpected inspiration at his mother's gallery opening.

episodes.name: Chapter IV
episodes.overview: On "Big House," Coco resists producers' efforts to pit her against Eva. Iesha calls out Sam on her own radio show. Gabe receives a fraught job offer.

episodes.name: Chapter V
episodes.overview: Al offers to help Troy and friends wrest control of the Varsity Show back from Miss Bernadette. Reggie strikes up a new friendship.

episodes.name: Chapter VI
episodes.overview: As Sam heads to Houston for a fateful trip with Lionel and Michael, Reggie and Joelle are trapped in a stairwell during a campus lockdown.

episodes.name: Chapter VII
episodes.overview: Under new direction, the Varsity Show begins to take on a different form. A party thrown by Joelle's sister brings simmering tensions to the surface.

episodes.name: Chapter VIII
episodes.overview: Troy's frustrations with his mom take a toll on his dating life. Joelle wrestles with an ethical dilemma. Coco devises a plan to take on Muffy.

episodes.name: Chapter IX
episodes.overview: Sam invites Iesha back on the radio — with dramatic results. Gabe faces an ultimatum from his uncle. Reggie weighs a big decision about his app.

episodes.name: Chapter X
episodes.overview: Opening night of the Varsity Show yields big surprises and a sobering encounter. In the future, the friends’ reunion takes an emotional turn.

4.name: Volume 4
4.overview: Reunited amid a pandemic, future Sam and Lionel look back on their epic final year together at Winchester — which plays out as a '90s musical.
